author: Owen S. Good
title: Sonic, Pikachu, Baby Yoda headline this year’s Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade
description: The 95th Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade is 9 a.m. EST on Nov. 25 and will be broadcast live by NBC. Balloons this year include Sonic the Hedgehog, Baby Yoda (Grogu) and Pokemon’s Pikachu and Eevee together in a sleigh.
